column5: Hey guys. Looking for a buddy for the weekend. New to river fishing here. I live in Erin (20 min East of Guelph). I don't know many areas and if someone wouldn't mind teaching me a few things would be appreciated. I can drive and pick you up. I'm off Fri, Sat, Sun so either day would be good.  Thanks guys,  Curt
Can't help you out, I don't live in that area anymore.  Erin is a nice little town though, I worked at Calerin golf course a few years ago.
I golf there or at Erin Heights every week
Perhaps you would have more luck if this was in the correct area of the forums. Try posting this in the hookups area of OFC.  G

Had a membership at Dairydale for years, back in the 80,s and also golfed Erin. You got some great little streams in your area.I did very well in the Grandvalley area. Use to walk for miles. Have a great weekend fishing.

I'm going down to the Barrie area to visit the gf's parents and I was planning on going fishing. I don't know where to fish though but if you want to get together and try some places, I was asking around and some of the tribs to Georgian Bay were where I was planning on going. Let me know here or PM me.
Hey guys. My wife volunteered me to cut down some trees at her mothers on Saturday so I'll only be available on Friday or Sunday.
